articles.author: Phil Helsel
articles.title: South African helicopter crash blamed on penguin in a box - NBC News
articles.description: They’re flightless for good reason: A penguin in a cardboard box contributed to the crash of a helicopter in South Africa in January, a recently published government report says.
articles.content:
Theyre flightless for good reason: A penguin in a cardboard box contributed to the crash of a helicopter in South Africa in January, a recently published government report says.
